title: Dainese Linea 01 is world’s lightest full face DH helmet at 570g, plus 370g half shell too!
content:
Dainese hadn’t made mountain bike helmets for years, but they’ve come back from their moto roots strong with the new world’s lightest DH-certified full face mountain bike helmet, this 570g Dainese Linea 01. It’s super open, well-ventilated, includes MIPS protection, international certification, and it’s competitively priced. Plus, there’s an equally light half shell Linea 03 […]

The post Dainese Linea 01 is world’s lightest full face DH helmet at 570g, plus 370g half shell too! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
